body:
Seeing the results of the recently concluded staff reassessment, how does everybody feel about this? Personally, I feel that despite the efforts to try to see which staff was "worthy" enough to continue, it seemed to me that only friends of these senior moderators got in. I've noticed that there were some very good moderators that were demoted just now. I don't see how or why this happened, yet there are moderators who aren't quite as competent that stayed in position. I will not name any names. 

I provided a Strawpoll link for you to vote on, and you can further discuss your thoughts on what just happened below. 

http://strawpoll.me/4043303
body_tagged:
Seeing the results of the recently concluded staff reassessment, how does everybody feel about this? Personally, I feel that despite the efforts to try to see which staff was "worthy" enough to continue, it seemed to me that only friends of these senior moderators got in. I've noticed that there were some very good moderators that were demoted just now. I don't see how or why this happened, yet there are moderators who aren't quite as competent that stayed in position. I will not name any names. 

I provided a Strawpoll link for you to vote on, and you can further discuss your thoughts on what just happened below. 

http://strawpoll.me/4043303
title: Staff Reassessment - Biased?

replies.body: Omg.
replies.body_tagged: Omg.

replies.body: I agree with this. Sunrise should not have gotten demoted in my eyes. There may have been some things between the staff and him that made you demote him but he is one of the most active avicus member and one of the greatest. Keep him as mod.
replies.body_tagged: I agree with this. Sunrise should not have gotten demoted in my eyes. There may have been some things between the staff and him that made you demote him but he is one of the most active avicus member and one of the greatest. Keep him as mod.

replies.body: lol.
replies.body_tagged: lol.

replies.body:
"Unjust demotions and, probably, sugarcoated excuses."
First of all, we aren't going to sugarcoat shit. Ask us questions privately and we'll give you the answer, no bullshit.

Next, we have more statistics on performance of our Moderators than any of you do, so don't try to prove us wrong in our research, we don't just kick people out because we don't like them.
We planned out our reassessment in which we would announce it well after we monitored the activity, attitude, and actions of our Moderators. We know who started sucking up one week after the revamp.

Next, staff apps are opening up in 2 weeks. We know who's shitting all over our decisions and insulting us in a public livestream, and we'll see them when they're begging for a second chance in their application. You could even consider this a test of loyalty.

Don't try to hate on what we do when you don't know what the fuck goes on behind the scenes.
replies.body_tagged:

We planned out our reassessment in which we would announce it well after we monitored the activity, attitude, and actions of our Moderators. We know who started sucking up one week after the revamp.

Next, staff apps are opening up in 2 weeks. We know who's shitting all over our decisions and insulting us in a public livestream, and we'll see them when they're begging for a second chance in their application. You could even consider this a test of loyalty.

Don't try to hate on what we do when you don't know what the fuck goes on behind the scenes.

replies.body:
I honestly don't see much bias.

Take me for example, I haven't really gotten too close to most of the Sr Moderators +, but I still remained Moderator.

If a demoted Moderator wishes to speak about their demotion, they will do so. They were not demoted because of bias; there was a reason for why the Sr Staff felt like they should not continue moderating.

replies.body:
A. General Etiquette and Behavior
1.Maintain a casual and positive atmosphere at all times. Inappropriate or aggressive language, regardless if it is directed at someone or not, will not be tolerated. Be respectful of all players. Harassment, bullying, rudeness and excessive swearing is strictly not allowed.

replies.body: I can see a vast majority of you guys are upset. But you see, we can't please everyone, and we won't do that. It's not our objective to cause havoc or have bias towards other fellow Staff. Nothing will always please you in life. Our opinions on the revamp were justified. I bet if your friends weren't demoted, I bet you wouldn't have complained one bit. You know, it's part of the system, we can't be bias and let Staff who aren't doing their job correctly, stay. I haven't been Senior for very long, and I can't already determine what Staff members we'rent doing their job correctly. It's wasnt revolved around ones opinion. We had all of our own. So, tell me, when you're a Senior Moderator, tell me that you're going to please every single person on this server.  You can't. It's impossible. Whether we demoted your friends or not, we reviewed and watched them closely on their performance. It's not like we made up a last min. decision if we like them or not. This is the complete truth. We watch and review, just like Junjor Moderators. If they're ready, we can promote them. If they can't do the task we assigined them, it's fair enough they will be demoted from their rank. Half of the time, you don't see what Staff do. You're not in our Staff Chat. You have no idea what Senior Mods see. It's our job to watch over the Mods. We will maintain that role professionally and with zero tolerance of a Staff having bias towards one. So now, we all have our opinions, you spoke yours. And we have the truth. It was in fairness.
replies.body_tagged: I can see a vast majority of you guys are upset. But you see, we can't please everyone, and we won't do that. It's not our objective to cause havoc or have bias towards other fellow Staff. Nothing will always please you in life. Our opinions on the revamp were justified. I bet if your friends weren't demoted, I bet you wouldn't have complained one bit. You know, it's part of the system, we can't be bias and let Staff who aren't doing their job correctly, stay. I haven't been Senior for very long, and I can't already determine what Staff members we'rent doing their job correctly. It's wasnt revolved around ones opinion. We had all of our own. So, tell me, when you're a Senior Moderator, tell me that you're going to please every single person on this server.  You can't. It's impossible. Whether we demoted your friends or not, we reviewed and watched them closely on their performance. It's not like we made up a last min. decision if we like them or not. This is the complete truth. We watch and review, just like Junjor Moderators. If they're ready, we can promote them. If they can't do the task we assigined them, it's fair enough they will be demoted from their rank. Half of the time, you don't see what Staff do. You're not in our Staff Chat. You have no idea what Senior Mods see. It's our job to watch over the Mods. We will maintain that role professionally and with zero tolerance of a Staff having bias towards one. So now, we all have our opinions, you spoke yours. And we have the truth. It was in fairness.

replies.body:
*clears throat*

The problem here is clear to me. I see both sides of the story. All to often, as MidnightBeats said, mods are being demoted for what they did wrong. Maybe if what they did right was also assessed, and then they were given feedback on how they could do their job better, rather than being straight up demoted, with no feedback given. Think about it. If that was the process, we wouldn't be in this fucking position!! 

Thank you.

replies.body:
Look, I pretty much Understand the frustration of some people, I was like that at the beginning. But, I have realized, As Michael Says, That Senior Mods Actually know Mods much better that we all do, And He is right on that.

Some Demotions in some opinions were not correct, In the eyes of others there are. So we have a Bit of a Forum Division. But please don´t Talk Crap about Staff members In general Are people that work to help you guys, And You pay them with Insults. Are we really on the 21st Century Guys?

I will give you  a Example So you see what I mean:
Situation: Avicus Teamspeak
Time: Couple of Hours Ago
Where: Suite 2
-Guys, Have you heard About the Demotions?
- Yea, Jozz´s Was really Fair, He really didn´t do much.
- But Riley´s One was SO unfair, Friken Senior Mods, They don´t know what they are doing.

Senior Mods Dont Know what They Are doing? Senior means Experienced, And that means, That Senior Mods probably Have more Experience than you, And As Docta Said, Tell them on a Private way, Not on a Stream.

In My opinion, You should not be talking Rubbish about Staff members, Because They Work MUCH more than you think, And Some people Say Michael/Straightened does not help, Or does not do anything. Trust me He does, If he Didn´t, He would have probably already got demoted.

Please Just stop it, Demotions are TEMPORAL, NOT PERMANENT

Getting back to the point, it is disgusting to see the staff at this level.
Seeing a senior staff of all people to openly swear and loophole their way around their reasoning is just appalling.

But that can't happen unless people like you who are unwilling to do anything start trying to make a stand.

Not to mention a Senior rank is far more important and requires a great deal of experience to acquire, you of all people should have known better.

Also I'm not stating that I was a perfect well behaved peach on the staff team

replies.body:
I think you all need a bit of an enlightenment here.

I'm not mentioning anything about the staff re-assessment, and I'm not pointing fingers. But to those of you who are continuously pouring gas into the fire, then you have the balls to call someone else pathetic? Shame on you. It sure would be nice if we could all get along, right? Wait.. We can! If each and every one of you take off your pissy pants and change your attitude, that can become possible. However, ranting and going on and on about something isn't going to change a damn thing. "Sweet, I won an argument" is just about the best thing any of you are going to get out of this. I wouldn't say its worth your time to continue this, it's pretty pointless. 

Another thjng to add, is that this is a pretty large flame war. Could one of the staff members who's been responding to this post just lock it? If possible.

Thanks!
